Package com.what2see.service.user

Class ConversationService

java.lang.Object
com.what2see.service.user.ConversationService
@Service public class ConversationService extends Object
Service class that handles the business logic for Conversation entities.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Conversation>
    findAll()
    Returns all Conversation entities.
    Conversation
    findById(Long conversationId)
    Returns the Conversation entity with the given id.
    Conversation
    findByParticipants(Long touristId, Long guideId)
    Returns the Conversation entity with the given participants.
    boolean
    isVisible(Conversation c, Long userId)
    Returns whether the given Conversation entity is visible to the given User.
    A conversation is visible to a user if the user is either the tourist or the guide of the conversation.
    Conversation
    startConversation(Conversation newConversation)
    Create a new Conversation entity with one or more messages from tourist to guide.
    Note that doesn't throw error if conversation is started with multiple messages or from guide to tourist.

    • findById

      public Conversation findById(Long conversationId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Returns the Conversation entity with the given id.
      Parameters:
      conversationId - id of the conversation
      Returns:
      conversation with the given id
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no conversation with the given id exists

    • findByParticipants

      public Conversation findByParticipants(Long touristId, Long guideId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Returns the Conversation entity with the given participants.
      Parameters:
      touristId - id of the tourist
      guideId - id of the guide
      Returns:
      conversation with the given participants
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no conversation with the given participants exists

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible(Conversation c, Long userId)
      Returns whether the given Conversation entity is visible to the given User.
      A conversation is visible to a user if the user is either the tourist or the guide of the conversation.
      Parameters:
      c - conversation to check
      userId - id of the user
      Returns:
      whether the conversation is visible to the user

    • startConversation

      public Conversation startConversation(Conversation newConversation) throws ConversationAlreadyStartedException
      Create a new Conversation entity with one or more messages from tourist to guide.
      Note that doesn't throw error if conversation is started with multiple messages or from guide to tourist. However, this isn't allowed at controller-level.
      Parameters:
      newConversation - conversation to create
      Returns:
      created conversation
      Throws:
      ConversationAlreadyStartedException - if a conversation with the given participants already exists
